A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When I sat in the last jedi I was just tied up from the first to the last minute. Rian Johnson has managed in many ways to surprise me in this film in the possitive: The film was a tribute to the Old Trio\, and has concluded with the past. I personally liked the hinged very much.
